commentText: Tests that cancel with savepoint without a properly configured savepoint_directory, will fail with a meaningful exception message.
codeText: @Test_	public void testCancelWithSavepointWithoutConfiguredSavepointDirectory() throws Exception {_		setUpWithCheckpointInterval(10L)___		try {_			clusterClient.cancelWithSavepoint(jobGraph.getJobID(), null)__		} catch (Exception e) {_			if (!ExceptionUtils.findThrowableWithMessage(e, "savepoint directory").isPresent()) {_				throw e__			}_		}_	}
